title: Muan muanna kim Khawvel sual thimah hian
lyrics:
Muan, muanna kim! Khawvel sual thimah hian,
Krista thisenin min muan thinlungah.

Muan, muanna kim! Tulin min chhilh pawhin,
Isua duhzawng tih, hahchawlhna a ni.

Muan, muanna kim! Lungngaih fawn vel lai hian,
Isua awm nghengin, muanna a ni e.

Muan, muanna kim! Duhtakte then laiin,
Kar hla mah se, Isuan min veng tawn fo.

Muan, muanna kim! Kan hmabak hre lovin,
Isua kan hria, thutphahan a rel si.

Muan, muanna kim! Thihna lo thlen pawhin,
Isuan a hneh ta, theih a nei tawh nem.

Muan, muanna kim! a reh ang lei dote;
Muanna kimah Isuan min ko lut ang.
